# speechVoices()

**Type Method**

Retrieves all available voices on the device.

## Declaration

```swift
class func speechVoices() -> [AVSpeechSynthesisVoice]
```

## Return Value

An array of voices.

## Discussion

Use the [doc://com.apple.avfaudio/documentation/AVFAudio/AVSpeechSynthesisVoice/language] property to identify each voice by its language and locale.

## Obtaining voices

- **init(identifier:)**: Retrieves a voice for the identifier you specify.
- **init(language:)**: Retrieves a voice for the BCP 47 code language code you specify.
- **AVSpeechSynthesisVoiceIdentifierAlex**: The voice that the system identifies as Alex.
